prompt: Je ne reçois pas de notifications concernant ma propre activité. Comment puis-je activer les notifications pour mes propres actions?
expected_answer: Par défaut, vous ne recevez pas de notifications concernant votre propre activité (sauf si l'événement qui a déclenché la notification cible explicitement cet utilisateur). Vous avez la possibilité de désactiver ce filtre dans la section "Options de filtrage avancées" des paramètres de notification de votre profil utilisateur.

 To enable notifications for your own activities, you can follow these steps:

1. Go to the Notifications menu and click on the "settings" link. This will take you to the notification settings page.
2. By default, users only receive notifications when they are mentioned or when actions are performed on pages they created or updated. To receive notifications for your own activities, you need to select which "types" of notifications you want to receive. For example, you can choose to receive a notification whenever you create a page or publish a blog post.
3. You can enable or disable all notification types that belong to a particular application by clicking on the bells. This allows you to customize the types of notifications you receive and the frequency at which you receive them.

Here are some links that may be helpful:

* [Notifications Application Settings](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/#HSettings)
* [Enabling notifications for all users by default](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/#HEnablingnotificationsforallusersbydefault)
